title: Update zeroize requirement from 0.10.0 to 1.0.0

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Updates the requirements on [zeroize](https://github.com/iqlusioninc/crates) to permit the latest version.
Commits - [`1d85bf4`](https://github.com/iqlusioninc/crates/commit/1d85bf433bfb865e856672f47f858387e6797d0b) zeroize v1.0.0 - [`245bef3`](https://github.com/iqlusioninc/crates/commit/245bef32276fcb4050558581acfc9990bdc764ef) Merge pull request [#278](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/iqlusioninc/crates/issues/278) from iqlusioninc/zeroize_derive/remove_no_drop - [`b87a915`](https://github.com/iqlusioninc/crates/commit/b87a9153d8d74faa15470d03799c6d0445890fd2) zeroize_derive: Remove legacy `no_drop` attribute support - [`518310c`](https://github.com/iqlusioninc/crates/commit/518310c6db9a27ccb17a8cfd1fd288216c54f385) Merge pull request [#277](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/iqlusioninc/crates/issues/277) from iqlusioninc/zeroize/rename-bytes-preview-cargo-f... - [`1c97a68`](https://github.com/iqlusioninc/crates/commit/1c97a680e3b59b88e9dcaf2994e745ccdb8d0e0e) zeroize: Rename `bytes` feature to `bytes-preview` - [`9a82d85`](https://github.com/iqlusioninc/crates/commit/9a82d850795bd51b684f4d34f32dbc1cfaf0c5c3) Merge pull request [#276](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/iqlusioninc/crates/issues/276) from iqlusioninc/zeroize/loosen-vec-bounds - [`89870e9`](https://github.com/iqlusioninc/crates/commit/89870e93f7c09595de37d9477105b4443471aa99) zeroize: Relax `Zeroize` trait bounds for `Vec` - [`0e7a74c`](https://github.com/iqlusioninc/crates/commit/0e7a74ca61bdf449c04ebb8cc13c56d9e0325166) Merge pull request [#275](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/iqlusioninc/crates/issues/275) from iqlusioninc/zeroize/derive-clone-debug-eq-for-ze... - [`eeb5622`](https://github.com/iqlusioninc/crates/commit/eeb56222c6324b73cc51c3ffe818e6f83561e4ec) zeroize: Derive `Clone`, `Debug, and `Eq` for `Zeroizing` (closes [#266](https://github.com/iqlusioninc/crates/issues/266)) - [`9cc1069`](https://github.com/iqlusioninc/crates/commit/9cc10698be9a10cc09af0f9ea237706051400f45) Merge pull request [#274](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/iqlusioninc/crates/issues/274) from iqlusioninc/secrecy/v0.4.1 - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/iqlusioninc/crates/compare/zeroize/v0.10.0...zeroize/v1.0.0)

Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot use these labels` will set the current labels as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these reviewers` will set the current reviewers as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these assignees` will set the current assignees as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use this milestone` will set the current milestone as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in your Dependabot [dashboard](https://app.dependabot.com): - Update frequency (including time of day and day of week) - Pull request limits (per update run and/or open at any time) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired)
